ditems.name: aLTEr Attack
ditems.description: Match temporal identifieres with long-term identifieres to track users, modify messages and learn about website visits.
ditems.example: Malicious car software update through poisoned DNS response.

ditems.name: Wideband Jamming
ditems.description: Jamming above 24 GHz will take significantly more hardware knowledge, time, and money. Wideband jamming is very expensive.
ditems.example: A production plant leveraging IIoT over 5G has to stop their production.

ditems.name: Protocol Jamming
ditems.description: Similar to LTE, 5G NR contains a Primary Synchronization Signal (PSS) and  Secondary Synchronization Signal (SSS) which together are used for frame/slot/symbol timing as well as conveying the Physical Cell ID.
ditems.example: A production plant leveraging IIoT over 5G has to stop their production.

ditems.name: ToRPEDO
ditems.description: Call the victim several times within a short time period to trigger paging requests, to retrieve temporal identifier. Then take over paging channel to retrieve permanent identifier.
ditems.example: Shut down a smart factory by cutting off communications.

ditems.name: PIERCER
ditems.description: From the identified 7 bits of IMSI from ToRPEDO attack, leaves 24 bits to guess, which can be brute forced in less than 13 hours.
ditems.example: 5G enabled cars location could be tracked.

ditems.name: IMSI Catcher
ditems.description: Since no authentication is done by the base station, an attacker can fake a base station and leak the IMSI, symetric keys, and preform MITM. 3G, 4G, 5G signal have to be blocked, so the victim will connect to the 5G base station.
ditems.example: Phone calls can be wire tapped by the attacker.

ditems.name: TCP Retransmission
ditems.description: If the ISP charges for retransmissions: Create a MITM and start by letting traffic go through. Drop packets from the base station once every few packets to force the user to request retransmition. If done properly the user will not notice. The user will then be over billed. If the ISP does not charge for retransmission then send from the user device multiple retransmitions requests and add a crafted header to get free usage
ditems.example: Free data or cause others to pay for more data. Cars could use their montly allowance of data.

ditems.name: GTP IP Fragmentation
ditems.description: IP Fragmentation is the source for many types of fragmentation attacks. While standard IP Fragmentations are not required by the 5G standard, support for GTP is included. GTP allows the tunneling of an old form of packets that support fragmentation.
ditems.example: DSN cache can be poisoned allowing for an attacker to spoof any website
